guide:
# Worldbuilding Canon Guide

## Characters
One file per named character. Include core facts, personality, voice, arc, and constraints.

## Locations
One file per significant place. Include geography, atmosphere, who controls it, and what happens there.

## Factions
One file per group or organization. Include:
- Name, structure, and leadership
- Goals and methods
- Relationship to other factions (allies, enemies, neutral)
- How a member would describe themselves vs. how outsiders see them

## Lore
One file per historical event, myth, or cosmological concept. Include:
- What happened (or what people believe happened)
- Who was involved
- How it affects the present
- What characters know vs. what's actually true

## Systems
One file per system (magic, technology, economy, etc.). Include:
- How it works — rules, costs, limitations
- Who can access it
- What it can and cannot do (constraints prevent power creep)
- How it looks/feels when used
